## Goals

- Get a historical overview of psychology and the study of intelligence
- Reflect on definitions and perceptions of intelligence

## Instructions

### Tuesday reading(s)

- Yakushko, O. (2019). Eugenics and its evolution in the history of western psychology: A critical archival review. <i>Psychotherapy and Politics International, 17</i>(2), e1495.
- Coane, J. H., Cipollini, J., Barrett, T. E., Kavaler, J., & Umanath, S. (2023). Lay Definitions of Intelligence, Knowledge, and Memory: Inter-and Independence of Constructs. <i>Journal of Intelligence, 11</i>(5), 84.


### Thursday reading(s)

- Griffiths, T. L. (2020). Understanding human intelligence through human limitations. <i> Trends in Cognitive Sciences</i>, 24(11), 873-883.
